name: Coloriens
description:
A little game inspired in Space Invaders or Galaga. 

You can switch between different colors: Orange, Sky Blue, Lime and Pink. You also can shoot bullets to eliminate different "Coloriens", the colored aliens. 

If the bullet's color matches with the color of the colorien, it will pop and you will get points. 

Shooting coloriens with the right color will reward you with 10 points * level; otherwise, hitting coloriens with the wrong color will make you lose 5 points * level.

You have at least 1 minute to clear the first level and then you will add 15 seconds to your timer when you done a level. 

Finally, you will be able to see your last high score and level you have arrived.

Instructions:

A: Moves Left.

D: Moves Right;

S: Switch to Next Color.

SPACE: Shoot a bullet with the same starship's color

P: (Un)Pause

ESC: Back to Main Menu. In case of being at Main Menu, it will close the game.
